title: my way (Demo 1)
lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh, yeah, yeah
Yeah
[Verse 1]
Could tell your words is all for show
Actions display a different role
Know how to keep me on my toes
And I guess I been way too accessible
You keep my presence loyal
[Pre-Chorus]
Shit, you give off all these different vibes, I couldn't tell
If it's you and me, that's in doubt
But I don't sleep any less
Must be your lucky guess
So you the same as the rest of them, stay unaccessible, yeah
[Chorus]
I guess I like learning lessons on the hard way
It take every ounce of effort just to parlay
Boy, it's always in my favor, it go my way, my way
I guess I like learning lessons on the hard way
It take every ounce of effort just to parlay
Boy, it's always in my favor, it go my way, my way

[Post-Chorus]
My way
My way
My way
[Verse 2]
I don't gotta hit back or reply
Boy, you better keep one or think twice
Notice I'm the best one to keep by
Guess I shouldn't stay so accessible
You keep my presence loyal
[Pre-Chorus 2]
You one of them ones
You keep me on the edge and fuckin' then some
But I don't sleep any less
Must be your lucky guess
So you the same as the rest of them, stay unaccessible, yeah
[Chorus]
I guess I like learning lessons on the hard way
It take every ounce of effort just to parlay
Boy, it's always in my favor, it go my way, my way
I guess I like learning lessons on the hard way
It take every ounce of effort just to parlay
Boy, it's always in my favor, it go my way, my way
My way
